MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L24 postcode area of Liverpool, affecting properties in Burnage Close and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5.36PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the repairs required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:00AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:58PM on 18th March 2021.
